ctx: intros Q p q H1 H2 H3.
exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce eqP to an evaluable reference.

original: simpl. intros Q p q H1 H2 H3. unfold irreducible, canonical, eqP in *. intros H4 H5 H6. intros Hq. apply H4 in Hq. destruct Hq as [Hq1 Hq2]. intros Hq3. apply H5 in Hq3. apply H6. split. - intros Hq4. apply Hq1. apply Hq4. - intros Hq5. apply Hq2. apply Hq5.
